AetherUtils
Table of Contents

Class EncryptionBase

Namespace
AetherUtils.Core.Security.Encryption
Assembly
AetherUtils.Core.dll
Represents the base class for all encryption service classes. All encryption is performed using AES-256 and encoded with UTF8.
public class EncryptionBase

Methods

DeriveKeyFromString(string, int, KeyLength)

Derives a key to use for encryption/decryption from an input string.

This method should be called with the same arguments when encrypting and decrypting. Failure to do so will result in a failed decryption based on different keys.

internal static byte[] DeriveKeyFromString(string input, int iterations = 5000, KeyLength keyLength = KeyLength.Bits256)

Parameters

input string
A plain-text string to derive key from.
iterations int
The number of iterations. (Default is 5000).
keyLength KeyLength
The length of the generated key, in bytes.

Returns

byte[]
A cryptographically strong key.

FindSeparatorIndices(IReadOnlyList<byte>)

Find the first and last indices of the separator character in the specified byte array.
private static ReadOnlyPair<int, int> FindSeparatorIndices(IReadOnlyList<byte> buffer)

Parameters

buffer IReadOnlyList<byte>
The byte array to search.

Returns

ReadOnlyPair<int, int>
A ReadOnlyPair<K, V> where the key is the first index and the value is the last index.

GetBytesFromUtf8String(string)

Get a byte array equivalent to the input in UTF8 encoding.
internal static byte[] GetBytesFromUtf8String(string input)

Parameters

input string

Returns

byte[]
A byte array representing the input in UTF8 encoding.

GetExtensionFromBytes(ref byte[])

Get the original extension string from a byte buffer that was written to with WriteExtensionToBytes(string, ref byte[]). This method modifies the buffer and removes the extension bytes from it.
internal static string GetExtensionFromBytes(ref byte[] buffer)

Parameters

buffer byte[]
The buffer of bytes to read the extension from, passed by reference.

Returns

string

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException
If buffer was null.

GetExtensionString(byte[])

Get the extension string from the byte array.
private static string GetExtensionString(byte[] buffer)

Parameters

buffer byte[]
An array of bytes representing an extension.

Returns

string
A string representation of the extension.

Exceptions

NullReferenceException
If the extension could not be read from the supplied byte array.

Get a cryptographically strong random key that can be used for encryption.
private static byte[] GetRandomKey(int keySize = 32)

Parameters

keySize int
The size, in bytes, for the generated key.

Returns

byte[]

ReadIvFromStream(Stream)

Reads the first 16 bytes from an encrypted Stream. The first 16 bytes should be the IV.
internal byte[] ReadIvFromStream(Stream stream)

Parameters

stream Stream
The stream to read from.

Returns

byte[]

WriteExtensionToBytes(string, ref byte[])

Write the byte representation of the extension to the supplied buffer.

This method writes the extension bytes at the end of the original buffer.

internal static void WriteExtensionToBytes(string extension, ref byte[] buffer)

Parameters

extension string
The file extension to write, including the period (.).
buffer byte[]
The buffer of bytes to write to, passed by reference.

Exceptions

ArgumentException
If extension was null or empty.
ArgumentNullException
If buffer was null.

WriteIvToStream(byte[], Stream)

Writes an initialization vector to the first 16 bytes of a Stream.
internal static void WriteIvToStream(byte[] iv, Stream stream)

Parameters

iv byte[]
The IV to write.
stream Stream
The stream to write to.
